text: be’ālahina bemech’ereshawi k’eni yemīyaminutini ḥizibochi ālahinina melikitenyawini yemīkerakerutini sewochi፤ ābatochachewi፣ weyimi lijochachewi፣ weyimi wenidimochachewi፣ weyimi zemedochachewi bīẖonumi inikwa yemīwedaju ẖonewi ātagenyachewimi፡፡ inezīya belibochachewi wisit’i iminetini ts’ifwali፡፡ ke’irisumi beẖone menifesi degifwachewali፡፡ keširochachewimi wenizochi yemīfesubachewini genetochi bewisit’achewi zewitarīwochi sīẖonu yagebachewali፡፡ ālahi ke’inerisu wedwali፡፡ ke’irisumi wedewali፡፡ inezīya ye’ālahi ḥizibochi nachewi፡፡ nik’u! ye’ālahi ḥiziboche inerisu minyotachewini yemīyagenyu nachewi፡፡
